alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 10:56PM CDT until July 11 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1056 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weissert, or 12 miles east of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ansley, Mason City, Berwyn, Weissert, Westerville, Arcadia Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area and Gavin Siding. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 86 and 106. Highway 2 between mile markers 287 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 300 and 308. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
